name: Yajaira Hermoso
role: Master in Economic and Social Sciences
text: Working with Oswaldo was an excellent experience. His personalized advice helped me optimize the management of my accounting and payroll systems, significantly improving the efficiency and accuracy in my administrative processes.

name: Yelitza Marcano
role: Bachelor in Administration and Municipal Management / Entrepreneur
text: I fully trust Oswaldo to develop custom applications. The application he created for my business greatly facilitated sales and inventory management, perfectly adapted to my specific needs.

name: Rebeca Suniaga
text: I am delighted with the web portfolio that Oswaldo designed and developed for me. He achieved an elegant and functional digital presence that perfectly reflects my professionalism and unique style.
